title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2793/98 of 22 December 1998 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 1999 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2793/98 of 22 December 1998 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 1999 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1999 fishing year, the carry-over aid for the products listed in Annex I(A), (D) and (E) to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 (3) shall be as indicated in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1998.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 392, 31. 12. 1992, p. 29.
(2) OJ L 129, 14. 6. 1995, p. 5.
(3) OJ L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
